text: Giovanni Dwight Calderón (born February 8, 2002) is a Puerto Rican international footballer who plays as a defender. He is the brother of fellow footballer Joshua Calderón. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
